sentences.sentence: Excision and histopathological diagnosis continue to be imperative in some cases of recurrent naevi with atypical clinical features.
sentences.translation: 有不典型临床特征的复发痣应予切除并行组织病理学诊断。

sentences.sentence: Methods the surface layer of the giant naevi, mainly razor graft, was excised tangentially using electrical dermatome. Then the left naevi was removed by dermabrasion.
sentences.translation: 方法采用电动取皮机切取刃厚皮片的方法切除巨痣表层皮肤，残留部分采用皮肤磨削法去除。
